high_descs: Turn around and go near the bed.
Take the kettle from the bed.
Turn and go near the desk lamp.
Put the kettle near the lamp and it will be glow.
anns.task_desc: To glow the lamp using the kettle.

high_descs: Turn left, walk and again turn left head to the bed.
Pick up the kettle from the bed.
Turn right and head to the desk lamp.
Switch on the desk lamp side of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the kettle switch on the lamp.

high_descs: walk around and reach the bed
pick up the kettle from the bed
turn right to the desklamp with kettle
anns.task_desc: pick up the kettle from the bed and turn on the desklamp
